name: Concession discipline (trade, don’t give)
summary: Ensure every concession is exchanged for something of value and logged in the concession ledger to prevent gradual squeeze.
goal: Protect your outcome by making concessions conditional and reciprocal.
counterparty_guidance: Insist on reciprocity for any movement; no free concessions.
Slow the pace of concessions and link each to a clear trade.
If they will not trade, pause or restate your limits.
Track what you have already given to avoid drift.
